item.title: Hardware Wallet Integration in Bitcoin Core and HWI
item.description: Aaron van Wirdum: 00:01:46 Live from Utrecht this is The Van Wirdum Sjorsnado. Hello! Are you running the BIP8 True independent client yet? Sjors Provoost: 00:01:56 Negative. I did not even know there was one. Aaron van Wirdum: 00:01:59 One has been launched, started. I don’t think it’s actually a client yet, a project has started. Sjors Provoost: 00:02:05 Okay, a project has started, it’s not a binary or a code that you can compile.
